title: RPG Heroes Sounds
description: A massive pack of high-quality, professionally produced character sounds for any rpg game!
longDescription:
🔊 Listen to the Preview Here

📄 CHECK THE OTHER PART OF THE PRODUCT!

Ever wondered when looking at the graceful games, why do they look so captivating? This is the merit of sounds! In Ishodus Studio we specialize in the development and creation of the sounds you need to fill your game world with new colors. We have created a whole set of sounds such as environments, characters, monsters, interactions, weapons, gore, footsteps, and more to make your project sound amazing.


The perfect solution to giving your character a voice to be heard. Great for any type of RPG, and includes dozens of variations for each character/class.


This pack it's a part of our action-rpg sounds series that contains 3948 high-quality and Triple AAA quality sounds of characters, classes and heroes like Hero Dialogues, Enemy Dialogues, Follower Dialogues, General sounds, Thief, Necromancer, Mage, PriestÂ and more for your RPGs game!


📄 Includes 10 characters voice - each character has over 140 sounds, with his own style and a lot of variations:📄

  • Ben(male) - Battle Over, Battle Start, Cannot Carry, Cannot Use, Cannot Open, Charge Up, Class Specific, Critical Hit, Discover Area, Distraught and Emotions, Dungeon Cleared, Entering Dungeon, Found Loot, General Attack, Idle, Join Party, Level Up, Use Item
  • Vorici(male) - Battle Over, Battle Start, Cannot Carry, Cannot Use, Cannot Open, Charge Up, Class Specific, Critical Hit, Discover Area, Distraught and Emotions, Dungeon Cleared, Entering Dungeon, Found Loot, General Attack, Idle, Join Party, Level Up, Use Item
  • Dorian(male, dark, methodical, old, stout, wimp, young) - Battle Over, Battle Start, Cannot Carry, Cannot Use, Cannot Open, Charge Up, Class Specific, Critical Hit, Discover Area, Distraught and Emotions, Dungeon Cleared, Entering Dungeon, Found Loot, General Attack, Idle, Join Party, Level Up, Use Item
  • Ezabella(female, young, regal) - Battle Over, Battle Start, Cannot Carry, Cannot Use, Cannot Open, Charge Up, Class Specific, Critical Hit, Discover Area, Distraught and Emotions, Dungeon Cleared, Entering Dungeon, Found Loot, General Attack, Idle, Join Party, Level Up, Use Item
  • Idris(female) - Battle Over, Battle Start, Cannot Carry, Cannot Use, Cannot Open, Charge Up, Class Specific, Critical Hit, Discover Area, Distraught and Emotions, Dungeon Cleared, Entering Dungeon, Found Loot, General Atack, Idle, Join Party, Level Up, Use Item
  • Marta(female) - Battle Over, Battle Start, Cannot Carry, Cannot Use, Cannot Open, Charge Up, Class Specific, Critical Hit, Discover Area, Distraught and Emotions, Dungeon Cleared, Entering Dungeon, Found Loot, General Attack, Idle, Join Party, Level Up, Use Item
  • Han(male) - Battle Over, Battle Start, Cannot Carry, Cannot Use, Cannot Open, Charge Up, Class Specific, Critical Hit, Discover Area, Distraught and Emotions, Dungeon Cleared, Entering Dungeon, Found Loot, General Attack, Idle, Join Party, Level Up, Use Item
  • Spike(bold, methodical)
  • Aurora(female)
  • Joffrey(male)


This pack is a part of Action RPG Sounds series(UPCOMING).
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 3948

Number of Audio Cues: 3948

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz/ 1536 kbps

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 209 minutes, 3 hours 29 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/tt-production-853368438/rpg-heroes-sounds-preview?si=637449e481ce4879aeff5d21aed99337&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing

Important/Additional Notes: Each character has different variations of sounds, to avoid repetition

releaseInfo.releaseNote: This is 1.0 version of the asset, version 1.5 will be in bundle named "Action RPG Sounds Bundle"
